channel.title: milestone on Hayaan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in milestone on Hayaan's Blog

item.title: One Month
item.content:encoded:
This blog’s first post was on August 20. Today’s date is September 20. That marks one month that this blog has been active. Yay!

I still don’t feel any real effects from the blog. Maybe that will take a little bit longer. I do, however, look forward to posting every day, so that’s good.

The next milestone will probably be at 6 months.
